text:
@NYGovCuomo I fear for South Dakota where Trump is headed.
Thousands of people, tightly packed.
No masks required.
We will be watching your numbers closely weeks after Trump has forgotten you.
Oh and just ignore the coughing person, only lefties carry COVID-19 right? https://t.co/wf1xjvLp2g
